敟字的基本解释

敟
diǎn
古同“典”。

敟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diǎn］
［《廣韻》多殄切，上銑，端。］
亦作“敟1”。
(1)简册，指可以作为典范的重要书籍。
(2)常道，准则。
(3)制度；法规；法律。
(4)典礼，仪节。
(5)典故。
(6)典雅。
(7)经常从事。参见“典學”。
(8)掌管；主持；任职。
(9)抵押，典当。
(10)指当铺。
(11)姓。三国时魏有典韦。见《三国志·魏志》本传。
[②]［tiǎn］
［《集韻》徒典切，上銑，定。］
亦作“敟2”。

敟字的康熙字典解释
敟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
敟字的起名意思

暂无。

敟
Basic explanation of words
敟
diǎn
The ancient same "classic".
敟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diǎn］
["Guang Yun" is often cut, milled, and end. ]
Also known as "敟1".
(1) Short book refers to important books that can be used as models.
(2) Regular way, criterion.
(3) System; regulations; laws.
(4) Ceremony, ritual festival.
(5) Allusions.
(6) Elegant.
(7) Often engaged. See "Classics".
(8) Take charge; preside; hold office.
(9) Mortgage, pawn.
(10) Refers to pawnshops.
(11) Last name. During the Three Kingdoms period, Wei had Dian Wei. See the biography of "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi".
[②]［tiǎn］
["Jiyun" cut, milled, set. ]
Also known as "敟2".
敟
